title: Sicilian pasta alla Norma
ingredients: ['1 aubergine, sliced into 2cm rounds', '2 tablespoons rock salt (for soaking)', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '400ml tomato passata', '1 teaspoon rock salt', '1 clove garlic, lightly smashed', '5 large basil leaves', '225g penne pasta', '40g ricotta salata', '1 tablespoon diced fresh cayenne pepper, or to taste']
